changeSet.sql: UPDATE workflow_test_configuration SET environment = c.environment FROM ( SELECT workflow_test_configuration_id AS id, MAX(environment) as environment FROM connection JOIN workflow_test_configuration_connection ON workflow_test_configuration_connection.connection_id = connection.id GROUP BY workflow_test_configuration_id ) AS c WHERE workflow_test_configuration.id = c.id;
